about: Zerodha is India’s biggest stock broker offering online trading services in stocks, mutual funds, derivatives, and bonds at low costs via the Kite trading platform.
features: Online trading in stocks, F&O, commodities, currency

faq.a: Zerodha is an online discount broker that lets you invest and trade in stocks, mutual funds, and derivatives with low brokerage.

faq.q: Do you have a free plan?
faq.a: Yes! Equity delivery trades have zero brokerage. Mutual fund investments are also free.
Yes, Zerodha is one of India’s most trusted brokers and is SEBI registered.
₹0 for equity delivery. For intraday, futures & options, it's ₹20 per executed order or 0.03% whichever is lower.

faq.q: How do I open an account?
faq.a: You can open a trading and Demat account online through the Zerodha app or website. KYC is required.
